1621310.title: Atelier Sophie 2: The Alchemist of the Mysterious Dream
1621310.description: A mysterious story of a mysterious dream ... This is a story about one of the adventures Sophie the Alchemist had after she left her hometown of Kirchen Bell.

2594920.title: Atelier Resleriana: Forgotten Alchemy and the Polar Night Liberator
2594920.description: KOEI TECMO GAMES and Akatsuki Games present the latest title in the Atelier series, Atelier Resleriana: Forgotten Alchemy and the Polar Night Liberator.

2778580.title: ELDEN RING Shadow of the Erdtree

1164050.title: When The Past Was Around
1164050.description: When the Past was Around is an adventure point-and-click puzzle game about love, moving on, letting go, and the joy and pain of everything in between.

1121560.title: Atelier Ryza: Ever Darkness & the Secret Hideout
1121560.description: The concept of this title, the latest in the series to depict a new "Atelier" world, is "True-to-life youths that develop together, even if just a little bit".

945360.title: Among Us
945360.description: An online and local party game of teamwork and betrayal for 4-15 players...in space!

1999770.title: Atelier Ryza 3: Alchemist of the End & the Secret Key
1999770.description: The final summer, the final secret... Ryza's final adventure is about to begin!

1245620.title: ELDEN RING
1245620.description: THE NEW FANTASY ACTION RPG. Rise, Tarnished, and be guided by grace to brandish the power of the Elden Ring and become an Elden Lord in the Lands Between.

257850.title: Hyper Light Drifter
257850.description: Explore a beautiful, vast and ruined world riddled with dangers and lost technologies.

367520.title: Hollow Knight
367520.description: Forge your own path in Hollow Knight! An epic action adventure through a vast ruined kingdom of insects and heroes. Explore twisting caverns, battle tainted creatures and befriend bizarre bugs, all in a classic, hand-drawn 2D style.

646570.title: Slay the Spire
646570.description: We fused card games and roguelikes together to make the best single player deckbuilder we could. Craft a unique deck, encounter bizarre creatures, discover relics of immense power, and Slay the Spire!

521890.title: Hello Neighbor
521890.description: Hello Neighbor is a Stealth Horror Game about sneaking into your neighbor's house and figuring out what he's hiding in the basement. Play against an advanced AI that learns from your actions.
